scenes.description: Coco's graduation live talk segment where guests share their first impressions and memories of her.

subtitles.original: ということで今日はですね、あのちょっと第一印象ですとか、
subtitles.english: So I was hoping to ask about your first impressions of me,

subtitles.original: まあいろいろこの、まあ短い期間ですけどあったこととか、
subtitles.english: any memories you made with me during this short period of time and stuff.

subtitles.original: 少しお話できればと思っていまして。先輩方、何かあの...
subtitles.english: Would you like to talk about anything?

subtitles.original: 思い出とか私の第一印象と今の違いとかありますか？
subtitles.english: Or, like, has your impression of me changed since we first met?

subtitles.original: やぁね、会長はね、やっぱりさぁ、会長といえばARKみたいなとこあるじゃん。
subtitles.english: Well, we can't talk about you without bringing up ARK, can we?

subtitles.original: ね、マジでブームだったよね完全に。
subtitles.english: It was really booming back then.

subtitles.original: めっちゃ流行ってた！みんなやってた！みんなやってた！
subtitles.english: It was really popular! Everyone was playing it. It was all the rage.

subtitles.original: ね、会長との思い出っていうと、配信では載ってなかったんだけど、
subtitles.english: As for memories made with you, it wasn't on stream,

subtitles.original: あのボス戦の準備、そんときにね、
subtitles.english: but when preparing for some boss raid,

subtitles.original: 会長がすごい色んなことを語ってくれて、
subtitles.english: we talked a lot, even though you just debuted.

subtitles.original: 「デビューしたけどどう？」みたいな感じで聞いてたら、
subtitles.english: When I asked her how things were going, she was like,

subtitles.original: 「もっとVTuberっていう文化、ホロライブをもっとみんなに知ってほしい、
subtitles.english: “I want people to learn about hololive and VTuber culture!

subtitles.original: もっと世界中の人に知ってほしいんだ！」みたいなこと言ってて。
subtitles.english: I want people all around the world to get to know them!”

subtitles.original: なんかその時からそういう大きな夢を持ってるってことすごいし、
subtitles.english: It was amazing that she had such a big dream so soon after debuting.

subtitles.original: 実際ね、やっぱり会長は、もう言い切れないほどのものを残してる人だなって。
subtitles.english: And indeed, she's left an indescribable mark on this whole sphere.

subtitles.original: いや、すごいなって思う、うん。
subtitles.english: She's really amazing, no doubt.

subtitles.original: 作業しながらやってたんすけど、途中で作業せずに、
subtitles.english: I was just goofing off, playing on the floor while working on something.

subtitles.original: ARKの海からずっと地面に泳ぎながらずっとやってた...
subtitles.english: I was just goofing off, playing on the floor while working on something.

subtitles.original: めちゃ楽しそうじゃん！
subtitles.english: Sounds like fun!

subtitles.original: ね、懐かしいですね。いろんな思い出がありますよ。どうですか、他の方は？
subtitles.english: Yeah, it was! I have tons of memories from those times. Anything else, anyone?

subtitles.original: じゃあ初配信を見た時は、なんか本当に日本語めっちゃ頑張ってて、
subtitles.english: I noticed during your debut stream that you were really making an effort to speak Japanese.

subtitles.original: 頑張ってる中で見え隠れするこの「やばい部分」。
subtitles.english: But behind that effort, your wild nature was clear for all to see.

subtitles.original: 見えてた！見えてたよね！
subtitles.english: It was in plain sight. No, it wasn't!

subtitles.original: めちゃ頑張ってるって思ったけど「ん？」って思うこともあって。そこが良い意味でやばくて面白かったんだけど。
subtitles.english: I knew you were doing your best, but I also was like, “Uhh...” That was crazy in a good way, and I thought it was funny.

subtitles.original: 二人でスーパーバニーマンっていうゲームをコラボしたんだけど...
subtitles.english: We also played Super Bunny Man together.

subtitles.original: やってた！あのウサギのゲーム、やってたね！
subtitles.english: Oh right, you did! We did indeed! Right! We did indeed! That bunny game...

subtitles.original: やった時に本当に面白すぎて、初めて漏らすかと思って！
subtitles.english: It was so funny that, for the first time in my life, I thought I was gonna wet myself.

subtitles.original: やめなさいよ！アイドルですよ！
subtitles.english: Cut it out! You're an idol!

subtitles.original: こんな経験は初めてで、本当に楽しかった。
subtitles.english: I've never experienced that before. It was really fun.

subtitles.original: 楽しかったよね。あやめ先輩とは、実はこの中では結構絡みが、残念ながら少なかったんじゃないかなと。
subtitles.english: It was indeed. Unfortunately, me and Ayame-senpai haven't interacted much, compared to the others here.

subtitles.original: もっとね、ぜひ遊びたかったんですけどね。
subtitles.english: Yeah? That's right. Unfortunately. But from now on... That's quite unusual. I wanted to hang out.

subtitles.original: 本当に一つ謝りたくて。ココちゃんに、あの朝ココに出てくれませんか、ってお話を頂いた時があって、
subtitles.english: Allow me to apologize for something here. Coco-chan asked me once if I'd like to appear in Morning Coco.

subtitles.original: 一年くらい前かな？
subtitles.english: That was around a year ago, right?

subtitles.original: そうですね、かなり前ですね。
subtitles.english: Yeah, around that time.

subtitles.original: 「いいよ」って返して、提出したつもりで、全く返せてなかったっていう事件がありまして、
subtitles.english: I replied like, “Sure!” But then I mistakenly thought I did my work and submitted it, while in truth I'd ended up ghosting her!

subtitles.original: 本当ごめんなさい！
subtitles.english: I'm really sorry about that!

subtitles.original: 一年間ずっと気にしてたんですか！？
subtitles.english: You were worried about it for a whole year?

subtitles.original: 提出したつもりで「あれ、朝ココ出ないな、メッセージどこだ？」って。
subtitles.english: I thought I sent it, but then... “Wait, I'm not on Morning Coco... Wait, where are the messages?”

subtitles.original: このタイミングでカミングアウト！？
subtitles.english: You're spilling the beans now?

subtitles.original: 本当にごめんなさい。
subtitles.english: I'm really sorry!

subtitles.original: 強制じゃないからいいですよ。でも本当にもっと絡む時間できれば欲しかったなっていう。
subtitles.english: Don't worry, I wasn't forcing anyone. Just asking whoever was free to do it. But yeah, I wish I'd spent more time interacting with you.

subtitles.original: 心残りの一つではありますね。卒業後もぜひプライベートで遊んでくださいよ。
subtitles.english: Yeah... That's one of the things I regret. I really regret it too. But let's hang out after I graduate!

subtitles.original: ぜひ遊びましょう！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: For sure, let's do it! I'll be waiting! Thank you!

subtitles.original: チョコ先生！動きがなんか...
subtitles.english: Choco-sensei... Sensei... Oh, you know... Her moves...! What's with those moves?

subtitles.original: 最初の印象は「ココ語」を作ってるやべえ奴だな、と。
subtitles.english: Oh, Coco-sama... If we talk first impression... Your speech style was really something like... Coconese.

subtitles.original: 「ゲボかわドラゴン」とかもそうだけど、色々とやべえ奴だなと思いつつ。
subtitles.english: Coconese? I thought that you are just creating your own language there. Stuff like “Gebokawa Dragon.” I just couldn't stop thinking that you were a weird one.

subtitles.original: 第一波のARKブームの時は全然分からなかったけど、みんなやってんなーみたいな感じだったんだけど。
subtitles.english: Yeah. Then the first ARK boom happened. I had no idea about it before. I just casually tried it seeing how everyone else was playing it.

subtitles.original: 第二波でちょっとやってみたら、ドハマりしちゃって。
subtitles.english: But when I gave it a real go during the second wave, I got really addicted to it.

subtitles.original: 廃人になった！
subtitles.english: You really did! So you've noticed!

subtitles.original: 一緒にご飯行っても「いや、ARKがさー」みたいな。
subtitles.english: Yeah. Even when we went to eat out together, I was like, “So, about ARK...” You could talk only about ARK!

subtitles.original: 「帰ってARKやらなきゃ」って帰っちゃいましたからね。
subtitles.english: Just how addicted were you? She even bounced early, saying she had to go home and play ARK.
